name: Crew Tactics Puzzle
description:
Crew Tactics Puzzle is a fun and addictive game! A challenging yet relaxing game to kill your time!


HOW TO PLAY:
• Become a strategist and find the way to win
• Find optimal routes and merge the crowds in this tricky puzzle


FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy this game at your own pace!
